document.full_text: the newspaper admitted to intercepting the actress's cellphone messages and using them to publish articles about her private life, a practice that was apparently pervasive at the paper.
document.title: british tabloid apologizes to actress for hacking
lines_and_colors: the newspaper admitted to intercepting the actress's cellphone messages and using them to publish articles about her private life, a practice that was apparently pervasive at the paper.
